metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0863 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Upstream kernel video driver. Product: Android. Versions: Android kernel. Android ID: A-37950620.

notes.Note: tyhicks> There's currently not much info available on this but the CVE description makes it sound like it affects the upstream kernel. sbeattie> affected the "ASUS IT8566 HDMI CEC driver"; i.e. drivers/video/it8566_hdmi_cec/it8566_hdmi_cec.c

criterions.comment: linux-euclid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
